Text: So I ripped this for my android phone which has a screen resolution of 800x480. So the movie was ripped to 800x432 (instead of 888x480). Torrent has two files, larger has video bitrate of 1200 & the smaller 800 kbps. Audio for both is 128 kpbs with 48000 sampling done with mpeg4aac.rnrnHope you enjoy the movie as much as I did.rnrnNot sure what happened but when uploading the torrent it cut off most of the description. Whatever tho, its a good movie.
